ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: Only in response to equally jerky guys that need to be taught a lesson. this guy sounds like he fits the bill. ... From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@redback.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Only in response to equally jerky guys that need to be taught a lesson.
this guy sounds like he fits the bill.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:30 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians


I would say that having his pet kill him is a pretty jerk thing to do, since
that
would cause him to lose experience. i would hope that people on this list
aren't that
nasty that they would be advocating this.

At 03:18 PM 6/1/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Few tips:
>
>1) Do not group with him
>2) Charm him and make him attack his pet (he can't cast spells at all, pet
>may even kill him before charm wears off)
>3) Rinse and repeat
>
>Then for variety, run off with his pet in hot pursuit, chain pet then run
>back. Pet will get lost because it's so far away from him. Kill him when
>you get back, he can't make a new pet so he's even more helpless than a
>wizzie. When he dies pet goes poof.
>
>Lyrnia
